website_summaries.verdict: This probiotic has a higher number of CFUs (100 billion) compared to other Garden of Life supplements, with 34 probiotic strains.
pros: Supports gut health with digestive enzymes and boosts the immune system
Many users report improved gut function with regular use, including those with GI disease such as crohn's disease and celiac disease
cons: Some products arrive at room temperature, particularly during warmer months
Some people experience a negative GI reaction to this capsule

customer_reviews.title: No Effect
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive, but not very useful. First of all, it came in a package with an ice pack, but the pack wasn't frozen (warm to the touch). I don't think the bacteria were alive. Second, it had no effect on my system whatsoever. Just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R. Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. Simply fantastic
customer_reviews.text: For those with GI issues, this has been a game changer. My teenager has IBSD. Taming her gut has been a nightmare. Thank you for helping! The more we learn about what helps, the more we discover that adding a probiotic of high-quality makes all the difference. This has been the one That seems to help bring good balance to her life. She feels far more normal than she has in quite a long time. Thank you for this I can't thank you enough.
customer_reviews.author: ThereSheGoesShoppingAgain

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever company - bad product ! Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: Worst ever! Unbelievable. This product arrived with a hot pack instead of cold pack. Directions said store at 71 degrees. The temp was so much good than my skin - prob 110 degrees or more. I requested a refund replacement. The basically told me it was okay for the probiotics to be hot. They have not refunded or replaced the product.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Stucki

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived extremely hot, it was packed with a cooling pack, but was hot on arrival. so, I preformed “the milk test,” to see if there were some active cultures, nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Summerlin

customer_reviews.title: Relief of IBS-D symptoms
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product for about a week and a half and it has helped tremendously. I have IBS-D and have symptoms on a daily basis. I had tried the "cooked" probiotics but got no relief. The first 2-3 days I had intestinal discomfort of cramping and gas but that subsided on the 4th day. My IBS symptoms have not gone away but have subsided greatly. I intend to continue use this product and would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipped cold, they care about you.
customer_reviews.text: Get your health back people and it all begins and ends with your gut (and butt, pun intended). Garden of life probiotics are actually shipped cold. Imagine that a company that cares for its customers. I have rebounded from Candida albicans overgrowth and this product plays a huge part. Also, check out the life regenerator Dan McDonald on YouTube. He will save your life. Oh, he uses puradyme products and they too are in that top rated, caring company class. Get healthy!!!
customer_reviews.author: DCB II

customer_reviews.title: May need to try from store where it's refrigerated
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened, but body just didn't seem to take to this, still experienced irregular gas and bouts of constipation . Could be that it sat in the mailbox baking hot for quite some time before I got home, but it just didn't have the same affect as others have had, especially with 100 Billion CFU, 34 strains and the correlating price.
customer_reviews.author: kubball3

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey, but worth EVERY cent. These saved my brother's life!
customer_reviews.text: My brother was in the hospital for several months, battling Crohn's Disease. His immune system was actually trying to kill off and destroy his own intestines and colon. The Doctor's gave up all hope after trying everything to thwart and treat the disease, scheduling him for surgery to have a colostomy bag. My father purchased these Garden of Life raw probiotics and he did a 360 within a week! Get these and remain faithful in taking them!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Delivery came without ice/cooler and didn't have same effects I had ones I bought at local store
customer_reviews.text: It's not clear why but when I used pills from the local store (refrigerated), this probiotic really helped me to feel better with my stomachaches. I was really happy to find reasonable price in Amazon however delivery wasn't in cooler as described by seller. The pill also didn't seem to help my stomach pains as they came back while I was taking this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These have helped my digestive system immensely! I am no longer bloated after I eat a meal!

customer_reviews.text: My digestive issues are greatly improved when I am taking this. It is just a superior probiotic!

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients include milk

customer_reviews.title: Feeling sick from this
customer_reviews.text: I’ve felt sick and I’ve had an upset stomach since I took this. I made the mistake of taking it the second day and now I feel even worse. I think the potency is too strong for me.

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately this item arrived warm. The ice packets had ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this item arrived warm. The ice packets had thawed and turned into heating units instead. Since the probiotic is a live culture it is supposed to be kept refrigerated at all times. I had to throw the package away.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Harris

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic on the market!
customer_reviews.text: You can feel this go to work almost immediately. My doctor recommended that I start taking a probiotic. Searched the 'net till I found this. Showed it to the doctor, and he was impressed. The number of different strains and total number make this a unique product. My gut really noticed the difference. I swear by this stuff, and heartily recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ray

customer_reviews.title: THEY WORK !
customer_reviews.text: After more than 2 years of my BM problem with pasty & difficult control, these 2 products (Phillips Fiber... and Garden of Life - RAW Probiotics Ultimate Care) have given me great relief ! I'm hoping to get my General Practitioner medical doctor can convince my insurance provider that it is definitely a medical necessity & should be considered for coverage as an Rx prescription.
customer_reviews.author: WILLA GOODWIN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for an effective product! A++
customer_reviews.text: Ok so these probiotics are expensive lets just say it, but man o man do they work. I test all my probiotics in milk to see if the cultures are active and if you do to, you know most are not. These ARE and while manufacturers argue if that is an effective test, when you take this probiotic you will FEEL the difference. I took them every day fro about 10 days and now I take 1 every 3 days and I feel that they really work well. Excellent product, excellent company, all things considered excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Donald J Kerzner

customer_reviews.title: Arrived HOT
customer_reviews.text: These are not shelf-stable, and require refrigeration because they are live cultures. I paid extra for this. My "refrigerated" package just arrived. Not only is the teeny, tiny cold pack not frozen, it's HOT -- as is my bottle of probiotics. My advice is, if you must order them, wait until colder weather if you don't want to waste $40.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Logos

customer_reviews.title: Temp of shipping destination not considered.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived broken glass in shipping bag to Vegas heat of 112. One ice block was not enough to keep stable or cool temperature. Would like a replacement shipped more responsibily.

I won't make this mistake again and will simply buy at Whole Foods during warmer months. It may cost more there,but it's cheaper than buying online and throwing it away because it got too hot.

customer_reviews.title: Energy and Health back!!
customer_reviews.text: This product makes a huge difference with my *energy* and overall health. I feel amazing! I work with lots of little kids (6 a day of drooling, vomit, other unmentionables) and haven't gotten a bug or any illness since I started this product. I will be a repeat customer. Keep in fridge for best results. Side note-*It is a bit expensive for just 30 pills and the cooling pouch they sent it in was melted and hot so product came to me pretty warm.

customer_reviews.title: Great product but it was not chilled when it arrived.

The product itself is also very high quality, I sleep better, experience heartburn and stomach pain significantly less frequently, and generally have more energy. I'm a trucker and my diet is extremely poor, being fast food almost always, so a thing like this helps to keep me a bit healthier. It's no miracle cure, but it does exactly what a child would assume a multivitamin would do.

product_meta.title: Garden of Life - RAW Probiotics Ultimate Care - Acidophilus and Bifidobacteria Live Culture Probiotic - Gluten, Soy, and GMO-Free - 30 Vegetarian Capsules (Shipped Cold)
product_meta.description: Style:RefrigeratedGarden of Life RAW Probiotics Ultimate Care—the ultimate complementary probiotic. Many factors can compromise your body’s defenses, including the overuse of medications, stress, your environment, and even normal aging, resulting in the loss of beneficial Bifidobacterium. RAW Probiotics Ultimate Care’s high Bifido formula includes the clinically studied Replenish Blend, making it your ultimate complementary probiotic to achieve balance—helping you repopulate your gastrointestinal tract with good bacteria. RAW means our probiotics are uncooked, untreated, unadulterated; with no binders or fillers and no carriers. What we promise on the label is what you get—100 billion live probiotic cultures in a convenient once-daily capsule. Temperature-controlled cold storage and delivery ensure that your probiotics Arrive Alive and Stay Alive up the end of expiration date.
feature_bullets: ARRIVE ALIVE GUARANTEE: Controlled temperatures from manufacturing to delivery ensure that your probiotics Arrive Alive and Stay Alive through expiration. Best if refrigerated. Store in a dry place at 71° F (22° C) or below.
Immune Support: 100 billion CFU and 34 probiotic strains to support immune system health.
Cleasing Support: Replenish beneficial bacteria during your cleanse with 34 naturally diverse whole food strains.
CLEANSING SUPPORT: Replenish beneficial bacteria during your cleanse with 34 naturally diverse whole food strains.

DIGESTIVE ENZYME SUPPLEMENT: Delivers probiotic-created vitamins, minerals, and prebiotics as well as protein-digesting enzymes. Our Probiotic supplement is RAW, gluten free, and vegetarian with no binders, no fillers, no carriers, and no soy allergens.
